page.title: 09ALFRISTON - PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: There are six buses a day to Eastbourne from Alfriston which go via the District General Hospital. There are eight to Seaford. The Cuckmere Community Bus serves Alfriston on Wednesdays, taking passengers to Hailsham for the market. This bus is driven by volunteer drivers and is supervised by the Southdown Motor Services Ltd. The Cuckmere Community Bus takes 16 passenger and can be hired by organisations out of ordinary working hours. The nearest railway stations are at Berwick and Seaford.
